amendment.description: Amendment requires States to identify "workforce critical subjects", for their schools and requires States to provide an explanation of the subjects they identify as "workforce critical".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to establish a state-led definition of "workforce critical subjects", and requires states to provide an explanation of the subjects they identify as "workforce critical".

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. McKinley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
